advertisement.title: Advertisement & Marketing
advertisement.intro: We do not display commercial ads. Our platform is devoted solely to scholarly communication.
advertisement.details: Instead of banner ads, we focus on selective outreach—personally inviting researchers whose expertise fits the journal. Every call-for-paper email is concise, transparent and contains a one-click opt-out. We never sell contact data and strictly follow GDPR, COPE and best-practice marketing ethics to maintain community trust.

archiving.title: Archiving Policy
archiving.intro: To guarantee permanent access, we combine trusted third-party preservation with author-driven self-archiving.
archiving.details: Scientific knowledge must outlive shifting technologies and corporate lifecycles. Our multi-layered preservation strategy ensures every article remains discoverable, citable, and intact for future generations of researchers. By partnering with Portico, maintaining redundant off-site backups, and exposing rich metadata through OAI-PMH, we safeguard the scholarly record against digital decay.

points.portico: Locked archival masters preserved by Portico

aimsHero.title: Aims & Scope
aimsHero.p1: The Interdisciplinary Journal of Environmental and Science Education (IJESE) publishes original, double‑blind peer‑reviewed articles from around the world in the fields of science and environmental education. We aim to provide scholars with a premier venue to share transformative ideas and evidence‑based practices.
aimsHero.p2: IJESE welcomes systematic reviews, meta‑analyses, empirical and theoretical studies, essays, commentaries, and case studies that advance scholarly understanding and promote sustainability‑oriented education.

editorialPolicy.title: Editorial Policy
editorialPolicy.languageDescription: Authors must ensure that their submission is free of linguistic errors and complies with the journal's formatting standards.
editorialPolicy.editingDescription: Non-native English speakers are encouraged to use language editing services to improve grammar, clarity, and formatting before submission.
editorialPolicy.ethicsDescription: Submitted work must be original, unpublished, and prepared in accordance with ethical standards. All co-authors must approve.
editorialPolicy.dualSubmissionDescription: Manuscripts must not be under review elsewhere. Submissions violating this will be rejected immediately.
editorialPolicy.peerReviewDescription: All submissions go through an initial editorial check, then double-blind peer review. Revisions may be requested at any time.
editorialPolicy.submissionIDDescription: Each submission receives a unique ID, which should be used in all correspondence with editors and support staff.

submission.title: Manuscript Submission
submission.text1: All manuscripts must be submitted in English via the
submission.text2: Submissions should be original, unpublished, and aligned with the journal’s scope and ethics. Authors must enter co-author information and ensure consistency in language style.

preparation.title: Manuscript Preparation
preparation.text: Format your manuscript using A4 size, 1.5 line spacing, 11-12 pt fonts, justified text. Submit two files: a title page (with author info, contributions, funding) and a blinded manuscript (no author details). Structure: Title, Abstract (≤150 words), Keywords, Introduction, Methods, Results, Discussion, Conclusions, References.

references.title: References & Citations
references.text: Follow APA 7th edition. Include all cited works in the reference list. Use 'et al.' for 3+ authors in text. Direct quotes should include page numbers. Avoid op. cit. and ibid.

figures.title: Figures & Tables
figures.text: Tables must be self-explanatory with concise captions. Figures should be high-resolution (JPEG, 300 dpi), labeled (a, b, c...), and uploaded separately. Indicate placement with [Table 1], [Figure 1] in text.

articleFee.title: Article Processing Fee (APF)
articleFee.description: Modestum publishes all its journals as Open Access. This means all articles are made available to readers worldwide free of charge. To support this, a one-time Article Processing Fee (APF) is required upon article acceptance, covering peer review, production, hosting, and distribution costs.
